articles.description: The coronavirus spreads through direct contact between people so it's better forgoing sex entirely if you have concerns a partner might be infected.
articles.content:
It’s very unlikely that the coronavirus spreads solely through sexual contact, according to a new study that found no trace of the virus that causes COVID-19 in the semen or testes of positive patients. 
Credit: Pixabay.

articles.title: Nearly All Patients Hospitalized With Covid-19 Had Chronic Health Issues, Study Finds - The New York Times
articles.description: Only 6 percent of patients at one New York area health system had no chronic conditions. Hypertension, obesity and diabetes were common.
